General.Name: AVRO INDIA LIMITED
General.Description: Avro India Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of plastic molded furniture and granules in India. It provides chairs, stools, tables, and kid's chairs and desks. The company offers its products under the AVON FURNITURE and AVRO FURNITURE brand names. It offers its products through online and offline, as well as retailers. The company was formerly known as Avon Moldplast Limited and changed its name to Avro India Limited in November 2019. Avro India Limited was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Ghaziabad, India.

5.Name: Mr. Nikhil  Aggarwal
5.Title: Whole Time Director & Chief Marketing Officer
